sentences: Clarence R. "Clay" Drayton (born August 4, 1947) is an American songwriter, arranger, producer, and sideman best known for his work at Motown.
In a career that spans over four decades, Drayton’s songs have been recorded by Al Wilson, Lenny Williams, High Inergy, Táta Vega, and The Jackson 5.,
Drayton Teaches Songwriting at the Songwriting school of Los Angeles in CA.
